Uses of Package
com.nuecho.rivr.core.servlet

  • Packages that use com.nuecho.rivr.core.servlet 
    Package Description
    com.nuecho.rivr.core.channel
    The dialogue channel and turns, some abstract concepts of Rivr.
    com.nuecho.rivr.core.channel.synchronous
    Implementation of the dialogue channel running the dialogue in a separated thread.
    com.nuecho.rivr.core.servlet
    HTTP servlet controller classes.
    com.nuecho.rivr.core.servlet.session
    Session-related class used by HTTP servlet controller.
    com.nuecho.rivr.core.test
    Dialogue channel for test controller.
    com.nuecho.rivr.voicexml.rendering.json
    JSON renderer classes (for use with Rivr dialogue runner).
    com.nuecho.rivr.voicexml.rendering.voicexml
    VoiceXML renderer classes.
    com.nuecho.rivr.voicexml.servlet
    VoiceXML dialogue servlet and related classes.
  • Classes in com.nuecho.rivr.core.servlet used by com.nuecho.rivr.core.channel 
    Class and Description
    DialogueChannelListener
    Receives notification of start and stop events on the dialogue associated with a DialogueChannel.
  • Classes in com.nuecho.rivr.core.servlet used by com.nuecho.rivr.core.channel.synchronous 
    Class and Description
    DialogueChannelListener
    Receives notification of start and stop events on the dialogue associated with a DialogueChannel.
  • Classes in com.nuecho.rivr.core.servlet used by com.nuecho.rivr.core.servlet 
    Class and Description
    DialogueContextFactory
    Creates DialogueContext based on the HTTP request, the dialogue ID and the DialogueChannel.
    DialogueServletInitializationException
    Error during initialization of DialogueServlet
    ErrorHandler
    Converts a dialogue fatal error (a Throwable into a LastTurn
    InputTurnFactory
    Creates InputTurn and FirstTurn from HttpServletRequest and HttpServletResponse.
    InputTurnFactoryException
    Error during the creation of FirstTurn or InputTurn.
    ServletResponseContent
    Encapsulates servlet response (content, type and length)
    StepRenderer
    Renders OutputTurn and LastTurn into ServletResponseContent
    StepRendererException
    Error occurring during rendering of OutputTurn and LastTurn.
  • Classes in com.nuecho.rivr.core.servlet used by com.nuecho.rivr.core.servlet.session 
    Class and Description
    DialogueChannelListener
    Receives notification of start and stop events on the dialogue associated with a DialogueChannel.
  • Classes in com.nuecho.rivr.core.servlet used by com.nuecho.rivr.core.test

    DialogueChannelListener
    Receives notification of start and stop events on the dialogue associated with a DialogueChannel.

  • Classes in com.nuecho.rivr.core.servlet used by com.nuecho.rivr.voicexml.servlet 
    Class and Description
    DialogueContextFactory
    Creates DialogueContext based on the HTTP request, the dialogue ID and the DialogueChannel.
    DialogueServlet
    Abstract servlet interacting with a web client acting as the controller of a SynchronousDialogueChannel.
    DialogueServletInitializationException
    Error during initialization of DialogueServlet
    ErrorHandler
    Converts a dialogue fatal error (a Throwable into a LastTurn

    Creates InputTurn and FirstTurn from HttpServletRequest and HttpServletResponse.
